results.title: Metformin protects against diabetes-induced heart injury and dunning prostate cancer model.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ protects against @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Heart_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006335 @@@heart injury@@@ and @DISEASE_Prostatic_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D011471 @@@dunning prostate cancer@@@ model.

results.title: Exploiting the cardioprotective potential of metformin against cardiotoxic agents.
results.text_hl: Here, we reviewed the scientific literatures regarding the effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in preventing @<m>DISEASE_Heart_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006335 @@@heart injury@@@ induced by @DISEASE_Cardiotoxicity @DISEASE_MESH:D066126 @@@cardiotoxic@@@ insults.

results.title: Modulatory effect of metformin on cardiotoxicity induced by doxorubicin via the MAPK and AMPK pathways.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Met@@@ improved the abnormal indexes, serum markers of @<m>DISEASE_Heart_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006335 @@@cardiac heart injury@@@, echocardiography, electrocardiogram, cardiac @DISEASE_Fractures_Spontaneous @DISEASE_MESH:D005598 @@@pathology@@@, cardiomyocyte apoptosis, and oxidative stress markers induced by @CHEMICAL_Doxorubicin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004317 @@@DOX@@@.

citations.NLM: Chen J, Zhang S, Pan G, Lin L, Liu D, Liu Z, Mei S, Zhang L, Hu Z, Chen J, Luo H, Wang Y, Xin Y, You Z. Modulatory effect of metformin on cardiotoxicity induced by doxorubicin via the MAPK and AMPK pathways. Life Sci. 2020 May 15;249():117498. PMID: 32142765
